name: Meltdown Gel Cream for Acne-Prone Skin with 72 hour Hydration
about: What it is: An oil-free gel cream that hydrates your skin for up to 72 hours, provides blue light protection, and is made specifically for acne-prone skin..Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Acne and Blemishes..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Pentavitin: Clinically proven to provide up to 72 hours of hydration..- Ceramides: Improve and support a strong skin barrier..- Amino Acids: Provide antioxidant protection and support skin's resilience...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This gel cream is a dream on all skin, but especially acne-prone and sensitive types. Pentavitin, squalene, ceramides, arginine, and amino acids work to hydrate skin for up to 72 hours, while plumping and evening skin tone’s appearance. This formula is packed with ingredients to provide skin barrier and blue-light protection...In a consumer study with 18 participants (aged 35–65) using Meltdown Gel Cream, results included: .•	100% of people said gel cream left their skin feeling hydrated.•	100% of people said gel cream left their skin feeling moisturized.•	100% of people said they like gel cream as an everyday moisturizer.•	93% of people said this product did not make them breakout.•	100% of people said this product absorbed into their skin.•	100% of people said they would recommend this to a friend.•	86% of people said their skin felt softer after using this product...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Pentavitin: Clinically shown to provide up to 72 hours of hydration..-Ceramides: Improve and support a strong skin barrier..-Amino Acids: Provide antioxidant protection and support skin's resilience...Water (Aqua), Propanediol, Squalane, Diisostearyl Malate, Diheptyl Succinate,Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Behenyl Alcohol, Maltol. Tocopheryl Acetate, Terminalia Chebula Fruit Extract, Sodium Lactate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Arginine, PCA, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AS, Ceramide AP, Ceramide NS, Cholesterol, Ceramide EOP, Hydrolyzed Gardenia Florida Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Gossypium Hirsutum (Cotton) Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Sodium PCA, Laminaria Japonica Extract, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Polyquaternium-80, Sorbitan Isostearate, Saccharide Isomerate, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Aspartic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Glycine, Alanine, Dipropylene Glycol, Serine, Valine, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate,Glyceryl Stearate, Proline, Threonine, Isoleucine, Sucrose Distearate, Histidine, Phenylalanine.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Use: .-With clean hands, apply 1 pump all over your face and neck. Let absorb and continue with your day. Apply before, after or mixed with Meltdown oil. Best used morning and night....Recycling Instructions:.-Component is fully recyclable and does not need to be separated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been amazing for my skin, which I feel like has adverse reactions to most moisturizers. I’ve been using this as my daytime moisturizer and love it so far, and have even seen a reduction in breakouts. That’s said, the scent is incredibly strong, and sickly sweet. Some have described it as cotton candy and I would agree. It doesn’t worsen anything per se, but I find it a bit much personally and don’t really love the scent. Wish they would make a fragrance free one or just lessen the fragrance.

reviews.review_title: a must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this product is amazing! moisturizing better than expensive creams that you specifically pay for for the hydration my skin stays hydrated and plump all day long and I have dry tight feeling skin and have spent so much money on expensive creams that didn't even work so im so happy!

reviews.review_title: Comfortable barrier support for sensitive skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this cream. I have dry, sensitive, eczema and acne prone skin, and this cream does not exacerbate any of my issues. I don’t know where the sweet scent comes from, and it is slightly more dewy than I typically prefer, but it absorbs well and does not feel heavy. The process point is also comparable to cheaper alternatives giving you more bang for your buck. I am really happy I finally tried this product.
J’adore ce produit! J’utilise toutes la marque pour mes soins de visage et j’ai vu de très beau changement. La crème est très légère!

reviews.review_title: Tackling acne dry patches and melasma!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin breaks out with just about anything. Acne risk is the first thing I consider with anything I put on my face. If you have acne but also eczema-prone skin that is chronically dry and struggles with retinoids - keep reading! I have to use a thicker moisturizer that wont cause breakouts during the day to prevent flaking of my skin and overlying makeup. Historically this has been a baume or thick cream, but this product allows sensitive/dry skin acne sufferers to use a gel cream - lighter without the exuberant shine. It is hydrating and thicker, without being sticky.   The gel cream is light blue but leaves no residue on the skin, and sits well under makeup - no pilling and my skin stays hydrated for work hours - not 72h. It expedites the acne healing process, like any good moisturizer.  Besides working well for my acne and dry skin, it contains niacinamide and licorice root which both help treat and prevent dark spots or patches by preventing excessive production of pigment (in my case, melasma - yep, I've got a full house). It's too soon to tell if it is helping, but the ingredients are promising! Although it says it offers blue light protection, I think the more accurate description it is helps treat the negative effects of blue light in our environment. Sunscreen is of course still needed overtop.   I have sensitive skin and the gel cream is fragranced, which always makes me hesitate and worry about reacting, but I've been fine with 2 weeks of use. If anything my skin seems less red and blotchy than normal (win!). I think that the smell is pleasant (albeit a strong sweet smell) - so it may not be for those who prefer fragrance-free products.   This is not going to solve acne, dry eczema-prone skin, or melasma by itself, but it seems to be a safe and helpful addition to other prescriptions and products. I definitely recommend and will follow up on pigment once I've had a chance to assess the progress.   1 star down for fragrance and price for volume.

Cruellyfree Recyclable packaging Vegan Certified Clean  I am very impressed with this product!

I ended up at sephora and got turned onto this product. I have sensitive, dry (plus oily t zone), acne prone skin. This did not burn and it really hydrated my skin. I am on day 3 now and have noticed a HUGE difference in my skin.

I have used all the brands at sephora-ALL the most expensive- this moisturizer is unmatched. smells amazing- doesn't make me break out. ultra smooth and hydrating. like i said i never write reviews but i had to this morning. too good not to recommend- ps. i and 21- so looking for something to keep me hydrated without acne- i have nothing to say in terms of anti aging affects. xxoxox

reviews.review_text: I like it! I don't reach for it every day, but I use several times a week, usually in the morning after the Blume milky fade serum. It smells pretty, is light and non greasy, and doesn't break me out. I have sensitive, dry, acne-prone skin, so it ticks all the boxes for that. It would get a solid 5 stars, but I LOVE some of the other Blume products I use, like LOVE them, so I think I just had sky high expectations for this. It's good though! A little pricey, but a solid moisturizer for certain.

reviews.review_title: For the Melt down oil fans

reviews.review_text: I have been using this product on and off for the last few months and have really been enjoying it! I’m use to using the melt down oil at night which has a really strong scent so I was pleasantly surprised when the gel cream smelt like cotton candy! I find myself mainly reaching for it in the mornings when I’m breaking out because it’s lighter and doesn’t have that herbal smell. If you already love the melt down oil I’d definitely add this to your collection!

reviews.review_title: Replaces the whirl cream and hasn't disappointed!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so stressed about buying this product as it replaced the whirl cream, which was the only lotion I could use on my face. I was incredibly happy to find out that this new cream is wonderful. Doesn't inflame my acne and my face is incredibly soft when I pair this with the meltdown oil. Before this, I had tried literally everything under the sun to combat my life long acne, and I'm so glad I finally found Blume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this moisturizer all summer, it lasts for a long time! I loved using this along with the Meltdown Acne Oil and the Milky Fade Serum. I found it was very soothing to my acne and moisturizing but not too heavy. It also doesn't smell like anything which I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product! It smells amazing and does the job! I love how light weight it feels on my skin! Definitely something I'll keep buying! Along with my melt down oil, and fade away!

reviews.review_title: Heaven Scent Cream for Acne-Prone Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to product for everyday. It’s made of great ingredients that are clean and smells amazing. After checking out this product at Sephora many times I finally decided to get it and I’m so glad I picked up 2. The smell of the product is what stood out from the rest of my previous creams. It barely feels scented and is not heavy nor strong. It is a perfect smell that smells so heavenly and nostalgic that I love putting on after my daily wash. I honestly do reccomend if you want a lightly scented cream that does its job greatly! As a person with acne, it does not irratate my skin or cause breakouts. I am not disappointed in the slightest and am so impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I do not know how many times I have repurchased this product at this point but it is definitely my go-to moisturizer for the moment. This cream leaves my skin with just the right amount of hydration for my combination skin, does not break me out, and was not irritating while I was adjusting to tretinoin earlier this year. The smell is also a big plus as it has a soft cotton candy smell without the irritation of a fragrance. I am honestly surprised that there are not more people raving about this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have struggled with acne for years and nothing seemed to work but after around a month of using this moisturizer, my acne went down significantly. this leaves my skin hydrated and dewy without a greasy finish 10/10 will buy again!

reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is incredible! I’ve only just started using it but I’m so impressed with the results already!  After the first night using it I woke up with my skin feeling soft and hydrated. My makeup applied so nicely over it, and at the end of the (very long!) day, it still looked freshly applied!! I often get a bit of an oily shine by the end of the day but my skin isn’t shiny at all anywhere. I’ve seen people compare it to SkinFix’s barrier cream, which I used prior to this and, for me at least, this one is way way better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gel cream is a MUST HAVE!!!!! Doesn’t sit on my skin and it makes my face smell so yummy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product !! First off it’s fragrance free but smells like cotton Candy (win win). They have serious ingredients that pass the test to be safe for your skin. I am prone to these tiny bumps on my forehead but after 2 weeks of using this, they are gone. My skin feels so good and clear, I am obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SUPER hydrating! Smells good too and amazing price. My dry skin is so so so thankful!

reviews.review_title: Soo hydrating and did NOT break me out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells sooo good, and it's so hydrating! I usually have really dry, sensitive, acne prone and flakey skin so it's hard to find something that ACTUALLY works for me and keeps my skin glowing and plump. But this did just that!  PLUS it smells like cotton candy haha! I also love that it's non-comedogenic and did notttt break me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gel cream is so light weight but extra hydrating. I love the way it smells, the texture is beautiful. I love that it’s packed with so many great ingredients and it’s such a reasonable price.

reviews.review_title: No SPF and pretty basic meh.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kind of feels like an attempt to dupe the SkinFix barrier cream nothing special or different than what’s on the market.
